title: simple watch face
summary: A simple yet beautiful Android Wear watchface.
description: You can tell we really love the shape of our logo. We find it subtle and relaxing somehow. So why not use it to create a very simple but elegant watch face for your Android Smartwatch? Features:* 12/24 hour mode* Select background color* Option to randomize color each day or each time the watch wakes up* 2 different hand styles* Ticking (default) / Continuous seconds or disable them completely - NEW!* Battery ring on-tap - NEW!(the screenshots were made with the beautiful and extremely useful Screener app https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.toastcode.screener)
descriptionHTML:
You can tell we really love the shape of our logo. We find it subtle and relaxing somehow. So why not use it to create a very simple but elegant watch face for your Android Smartwatch?

Features:

* 12/24 hour mode
* Select background color
* Option to randomize color each day or each time the watch wakes up
* 2 different hand styles
* Ticking (default) / Continuous seconds or disable them completely - NEW!
* Battery ring on-tap - NEW!



(the screenshots were made with the beautiful and extremely useful Screener app https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.toastcode.screener)
comments: Great watch face. Really love how simple the design is and the use of colour. I only wish I could exclude some of the colours from the random colour option.
Card size is a bit big covering part of the time, but apart from that the face is good. Simple but eye catching, and functional.
Good Face Perfect but just need black or dark grey colour almost black
Great Watch Face Only thing is that the 12 hour time (am/pm indication) is wrong. Please fix!
Unique Wouldn't mind proper colour control rather than leaving it purely to chance
Really nice I feel like it deserves 5 stars simply because of elegance and simplicity. Nice work.
